Main Module¶

The Main module contains the main files that start the application and configure the graphical user interface (GUI). This module is essential for the operation of the application, as it establishes the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architecture and handles user interactions with the main interface.

MainWindow Class¶

This module implements the main window class for QuickEst application. It initializes the GUI, sets up the MVC architecture, and handles user interactions.

class Main.main_window.MainWindow(parent=None)¶

Bases: QMainWindow

The main window class for the QuickEst application.

Parameters¶

parentQWidget, optional

The parent widget (default is None).
